snippet: Dean G. Skelos, the State Senate majority leader, visited areas of his Nassau County district severely damaged by the storm, and criticized the federal government for its response.
abstract: New York State Senate Republican majority leader Dean G Skelos visits areas of his Nassau County district severely damaged by the Hurricane Sandy; he criticizes the federal government for its slow response, but effusively praises Democratic Gov Andrew M Cuomo.
lead_paragraph: Dean G. Skelos, the State Senate majority leader, visited areas of his Nassau County district severely damaged by the storm, and criticized the federal government for its response.

headline.seo: Skelos Examines the Wreckage in Nassau County
headline.main: Touring Wreckage on L.I. Amid Uncertainty in Albany
headline.print_headline: Touring Wreckage on L.I. Amid Uncertainty in Albany
